The beginning of the open-source Flex SDK.
Populated the flex/sdk/trunk directory with an open-source subset of files from //depot/flex/sdk/...@191097 in the Faramir Perforce server. This changelist is a bit past the 3.0rc0 build.
The Ant scripts will not successfully build yet. They need to be adapted to the open-source subset.

Remove ADOBE SYSTEMS license, if present, and insert Apache license - modules.  Will need another pass to convert files not handled by the scripts.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
SDK-27881: append library namespaces for compc ant task
1. Made "append" a special config attribute and update NestedAttributeElement to generate a "+=" command line argument when append=true.
2. Refactor "load-config" attribute processing logic in ant tasks to use the "append" logic in NestedAttributeElement.
3. Update "include-namespaces" attribute processing logic to allow "append" as an attribute.
QE notes: please add tests for "include-namespaces" with "append=true".
Doc notes: update compc user doc about "append" attribute for "include-namespaces"
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Modify the handling of FlexTask child elements to expand the ant properties before adding them to the command line.

Add a constructor for NestedAttributeElement (and subclasses) that takes a FlexTask argument. This allows NestedAttributeElement to call getProject().replaceProperties(), which is where ant expands properties in a string.
A problem restoring a video from fullstream that was already a popup before going fullscreen.

The fix is to check if the video is a pop up before going fullscreen. If it is then don't remove it from its parent and add it as a pop up. Just leave it was it is and don't reparent is when coming out of fullscreen.
Problem restoring a video from fullscreen that used percent widths and heights.
Fixed by adding percentWidth,percentHeight to beforeFullScreenInfo so percentWidth and percentHeight values can be restored.
